resources.string: There are no earthquakes near you.
Attention! An earthquake found.\nThe nearest to you is:
Connection problems, only cached data is shown. Check the connection or try again later.
There are no earthquakes here. Check again later!
This app helps you to know if there are some earthquakes near you. You could call your relatives in case of emergency
We show data relatively to the default location, because you prohibited access to location
We show data relatively to the default location, because we can\'t get your current position
It means that either it is safe around you or you set too strict filter rules (you can change them in Settings)
